location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP TO SHOW THE LIMITS OF KOWEIT AND ADJACENT COUNTRY.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper.Dimensions: 398 x 327mm, on sheet 495 x 380mm.

mods.abstract: Map issued as Annex no. 5 to the Anglo-Ottoman Convention of 29 July 1913 with inner and outer limits of Koweit [Kuwait] authority shown by red and green lines respectively. Signatures of Sir Edward Grey and Ibrahim Hakki Pasha appear in the bottom right-hand corner. Relief is shown by hachures. Printed by Harrison and Sons, London.
